overview: "Yoko Shimada", who has received a worldwide reputation as an actress, is fascinated by even more intense SEX! The shocking MUTEKI debut "Second Encounter" has not been able to capture the full charm of "Yoko Shimada". "Yoko Shimada" who releases uncontrollable sexual impulses and goes crazy is a masterpiece! Attract new ground with rich SEX that surpasses the previous work!
title: The Faithless Love
